attributes.action: Propose to Parliament that the MPs final salary scheme be closed to new entrants before the next election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that more than 200 new MPs are expected to join Parliament next year, this will place an intolerable burden on the taxpayer if they are all able to join the final salary scheme. 96% of the FTSE 100 have closed these schemes to new entrants. Politicians should share the pain of their constituents and shut theirs too.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
